DOC.brief_summary: A study healthy volunteer compare two different liquid formulation solifenacin tablet formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Healthy Volunteers Comparing Two Different Liquid Formulations Solifenacin With Each Other With Tablet Formulation
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize one six treatment sequence . The treatment separate minimum 13 day dose . Study drug administer overnight fast , food restrict additional four hour dose . Except water provide dosing , water restrict hour hour dosing . Subjects stay study site first three day treatment period . Subjects return study center morning time day Days 4 11 study period pharmacokinetic blood draw vital sign . Subjects study least 40 day .
DOC.criteria: Subject weigh least 45 kg , body mass index 18 32 kg/m2 Subject normal 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Subject , female , must least 2 year postmenopausal , surgically sterile , practice effective birth control , pregnant lactating Subject good venous access The subject history clinically significant disease malignancy exception nonmelanoma skin cancer The subject history currently evidence urinary retention , gastric retention , uncontrolled narrowangleglaucoma The subject history unexplained syncope , cardiac arrest , unexplained cardiac arrhythmia torsade de pointes , structural heart disease , family history Long QT syndrome ( suggest sudden death close relative young age due possible probable cardiac cause ) The subject know hypersensitivity VESIcareÂ® excipients formulation , subject history severe allergic anaphylactic reaction The subject history consume 15 unit alcoholic beverage per week , history alcoholism substance abuse within past two year prior screen ( Note : one unit = 12 ounce beer , 4 ounce wine , 1 ounce spirit ) The subject use tobacco contain product nicotine containing product within past six month The subject supine mean systolic blood pressure < 90 > 160 mmHg mean diastolic blood pressure < 50 > 90 mmHg , pulse rate < 40 > 100 beat per minute The subject know positive human immunodeficiency virus antibody The subject positive test hepatitis C antibody hepatitis B antigen The subject 's laboratory test result outside normal limit consider clinically significant The subject treatment prescription nonprescription drug , include complementary alternative medicine overthecounter medication , exception hormonal contraceptive , hormone replacement therapy , occasional use acetaminophen within 14 day prior inclusion study The subject anticipate inability abstain alcohol caffeine use throughout duration study grapefruit , Seville oranges , star fruit , product contain item throughout duration study The subject receive experimental agent within past 30 day ten halflives , whichever long The subject significant blood loss The subject clinically significant history gastrointestinal symptom nausea , abdominal discomfort upset , heartburn four week prior clinic admission , history gastrointestinal surgery except appendectomy cholecystectomy
